Lankawe muslim minissu diha balala hamadema thiranaya keranna epa. Lankawe wenas wenna one nithiyai pirimiy, lankawe pirimi strong ne. Sri lankan law and mens are week

Pirimi saha genu kawadawath sama wen na. Genu ho pirimi wewa api hemogema adu padu tynwa. Api hemoma asampoorna minissu. Genu saha pirimi ekthuwen thamai sampoorna wenne. Swabawadarmya geheniya saha pirimiyawa ehema mewwe hethuwak athuwai

comments.comment: A hamadema kale Chandrikage mara deshapalanaya obathumiyata vagema Rookanthatath aka kala habai a Chandrikage paudgalika uvamanavalma thamai
comments.author: Chamila Nilanthi Perera

comments.comment: She is a great lady. I have seen many of her  speaches and good motivational speaker. Keep going m'am.
comments.author: Ravi Chandra

comments.comment: Ada kale nam pirimiyak vemat bayanakai manda podi pirimi daruwan wath dusanaya karala marala danawa obatumiya kiyana  dewal attha budusaranai
comments.author: Karuna Karuna

replies.replyComment: Oba waradiyata therum aran, mata katawath mada gahanna one naha, habai meka aha ganna , lankawe desapalanaye themparadu wunu mama hama dekama depaththa dakinawa, obata athdakim thiyana tharamata oba therum ganna!
Oba dannawada Anoja weerasinghe mona tharam nihathamanee charithayakda kiyala nikam mada gahanna epa ,eya ratat jathiyata godak wada karapu kenek

Born to be Wild 
boge mole his wunata apita karanna deyak naha, mata denna ona paniwidaya me kiyana dewal api kalpanawen asiya yuthui.
bageta nida gena inne nathuwa nagitala balapiya rate loke wena boru kara dewal
Ballek biruwaneda vikarayakkda ? asathpurusayo thawamath ipadenawa neda -Eththa kathakirima desapalaa pasubikamk yana hegima boge molen makaganninn (don simon).ajasaththa papa...
Mahathmiyani oba thumiya mona tharam watina kenek da  sinamawen a gana danna aya oluwak thiyana aya dannawa hari we danai  idiri kawadawath wasanawanthawewai kiya pathami jesu pihitai
